snippet: Rabbi Dovi Scheiner and his wife, Esty, are expanding the Soho Synagogue “brand” — a mix of traditional Jewish practice with a modern urban aesthetic — to young Jews in other cities.
abstract: Rabbi Dovi Scheiner and his wife Esty are expanding Soho Synagogue 'brand,' which mixes traditional Jewish practice with a modern urban aesthetic, to young Jews in other cities outside New York.

byline.contributor: Ian Lovett contributed reporting from Los Angeles.

lead_paragraph: Rabbi Dovi Scheiner and his wife, Esty, are expanding the Soho Synagogue “brand” — a mix of traditional Jewish practice with a modern urban aesthetic — to young Jews in other cities.

headline.seo: SoHo Synagogue Exports Its Own Brand of Jewish Outreach
headline.main: A SoHo Synagogue Exports Its Own Brand of Jewish Outreach
headline.print_headline: After Success in New York, a SoHo Synagogue Exports Its Own Brand of Jewish Outreach
